name: Shakira
description:
Appreciate my work? Can you buy me a coffe please :)

Shakira: Shakira Isabel Mebarak Ripoll (Barranquilla, Atlántico, Colombia, February 2, 1977), known simply as Shakira, is a Colombian singer-songwriter, dancer, actress and businesswoman. Her high level of sales, vocal versatility and her global success have led her to be described by important magazines and media with the nickname "Queen of Latin Pop".3 She is considered a world icon of Latin music,4 since her His debut in the 90s to the present has had a great impact on the music scene,5 being cited on numerous occasions for inspiring and influencing an entire generation of singers.6 With an artistic career of more than thirty years,7 She is one of the artists with the highest record sales in history, with more than 85 million sales,8 9 10 being also the Latin artist with the highest sales in the United States.

Used model: Realistic Vision v1,3

recommended parameters:

Prompt:

RAW photo, a close up portrait photo of 26 y.o woman in wastelander clothes, long haircut, pale skin, slim body, background is city ruins, (high detailed skin:1.2), 8k uhd, dslr, soft lighting, high quality, film grain, Fujifilm XT3

Negative Prompt:
(deformed iris, deformed pupils, semi-realistic, cgi, 3d, render, sketch, cartoon, drawing, anime:1.4), text, close up, cropped, out of frame, worst quality, low quality, jpeg artifacts, ugly, duplicate, morbid, mutilated, extra fingers, mutated hands, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn face, mutation, deformed, blurry, dehydrated, bad anatomy, bad proportions, extra limbs, cloned face, disfigured, gross proportions, malformed limbs, missing arms, missing legs, extra arms, extra legs, fused fingers, too many fingers, long neck


Euler A or DPM++ 2M Karras with 25 steps
CFG Scale 7

QR to my page buymeacoffee

Hide
